summary: Digital onboarding workflow enabling minors (<18) to create accounts with guardian-based KYC verification. System requires multi-step process with seamless minor-to-guardian handoff, third-party KYC provider integration, and strict compliance with COPPA/GDPR-K regulations. Key features: real-time guardian KYC processing, duplicate prevention, guardian switching support, mobile-optimized UX, and comprehensive audit trails. All data must be encrypted at rest/transit. Dependencies include certified KYC providers and extensible architecture for future verification methods.
